name: MIS Activity Attendance INC2396692
description:
The report returns a list of prisoners, currently in the establishment and their activity attendance status for a date range. The data is shown over 4 tabs: All Attendance by Activity Service Description, by Surname and by Attendance Status. 4th tab also displays attendance comments and If a Case Note Warning entry has been issued. 5th tab display details of the Warning types. The report can be displayed by individual Wing or by all Wings.
ACT0021 - v2.0Last Modified: 13/02/2023

dataset.name: Activities
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, nvl(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND,'** Incentive Level Missing **'), AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SUSPENDED_FLAG, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME), nvl(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE,'No Slot'),  CASE WHEN ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_PRRD_DATE )<( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE ) Then ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_PRRD_DATE ) WHEN( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE )<( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_CRD_DATE ) Then ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE ) WHEN ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE )<( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_ETD_DATE ) then ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE ) WHEN ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE )<( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_LTD_DATE ) then ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE ) ELSE DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE.CURR_RELEASE_DATE END , AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.COMMENT_TEXT, AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE, (   Select AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK as OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK, case when AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE <> '31/12/9000' Then AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE end as CURR_RELEASE_DATE From --BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE AT_FACT_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_RELEASE_DATE where --AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=AT_FACT_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK(+) AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.RELEASE_CALCULATED_DATE_SK=AT_RELEASE_DATE.DATE_SK(+) and AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.SENTENCE_CURRENT_FLAG='Y' --and AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE !='31/12/9000' ) DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE, FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS WHERE ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK(+) ) AND ( AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK=AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK ) AND ( AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK=AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK ) AND ( AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG='Y' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID=CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username from context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY')-6 ) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK ) AND ( AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK ) AND ( AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.CODE_DOMAIN(+)='PS_PA_OC' ) AND ( AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.CODE(+)=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.STATUS ) AND ( AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK ) AND ( AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK ) AND ( ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND='Y' ) AND ( case when 'All' in ('All') then 'All' else AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION end in ('All') ) AND ( AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ALLOCATED_FLAG = 'Y' ) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK >= 1 AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code from prompt_) AND AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code from prompt_) AND TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) BETWEEN '28-03-2024 00:00:00' AND '01-04-2024 00:00:00' ) UNION SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, '-', '-', nvl(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND,'** Incentive Level Missing **'), AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SUSPENDED_FLAG, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME), nvl(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE,'No Slot'),  CASE WHEN ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_PRRD_DATE )<( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE ) Then ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_PRRD_DATE ) WHEN( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE )<( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_CRD_DATE ) Then ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE ) WHEN ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE )<( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_ETD_DATE ) then ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE ) WHEN ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE )<( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_LTD_DATE ) then ( FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_MTD_DATE ) ELSE DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE.CURR_RELEASE_DATE END , AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.COMMENT_TEXT, AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE, (   Select AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK as OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK, case when AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE <> '31/12/9000' Then AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE end as CURR_RELEASE_DATE From --BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE AT_FACT_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_RELEASE_DATE where --AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=AT_FACT_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK(+) AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.RELEASE_CALCULATED_DATE_SK=AT_RELEASE_DATE.DATE_SK(+) and AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.SENTENCE_CURRENT_FLAG='Y' --and AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE !='31/12/9000' ) DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE, FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK(+) ) AND ( AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK=AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID=CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username from context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY')-6 ) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK=AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK ) AND ( AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG='Y' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK ) AND ( AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK ) AND ( AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.CODE_DOMAIN(+)='PS_PA_OC' ) AND ( AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.CODE(+)=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.STATUS ) AND ( AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK ) AND ( AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK ) AND ( ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND='Y' ) AND ( case when 'All' in ('All') then 'All' else AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION end in ('All') ) AND ( AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ALLOCATED_FLAG = 'Y' ) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK < 1 AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code from prompt_) AND AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code from prompt_) AND TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) BETWEEN '28-03-2024 00:00:00' AND '01-04-2024 00:00:00' )), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Case Notes
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CREATE_TIME FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CONTACT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.REFERENCE_CODE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE_CODE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE_DOMAIN = 'TASK_SUBTYPE') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (CASE WHEN 'All' IN ('All') THEN 'All' ELSE AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION END IN ('All')) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ALLOCATED_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE > TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN ('A0016ER', 'A0075CZ', 'A0091CX', 'A0096CV', 'A0108FC', 'A0115DY', 'A0152EP', 'A0158CF', 'A0173EJ', 'A0193AQ', 'A0202DA', 'A0209FC', 'A0215EZ', 'A0216FC', 'A0218EZ', 'A0239EW', 'A0249CG', 'A0284AG', 'A0290CM', 'A0292CM', 'A0300AM', 'A0329EM', 'A0356FA', 'A0362FA', 'A0375FA',
